products.title: Bella Blackout Dove Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout dove grey roller blind in grey. Made to measure from 9.85 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! This soft dove grey roller blind adds bold and vibrant enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Their roller are great for privacy and light control. At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This grey neutral roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2104 fabric colour: dove grey material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Bella Butter (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure bella butter (blackout) blackout roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality blackout roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 200mm max width: 3048mm
